Kevin Welcher

Spring 2013 - Present

WillowTree has given me the chance to architect large web applications from scratch, quickly iterate based on what works, and employee the knowledge in subsequent projects. The quick iterations encourage growth and honing of skills

Chatter Sports LLC

Lead (Web) Game Developer
Charlottesville, VA
Spring 2012 - Winter 2013

I took this opportunity to see what the business development side of a startup was like. Javascript game development coupled with always keeping an ear to performance with the Chrome Dev Tools

  • Joined founding members as the initial developer, identified appropriate technical stack with focus on creating highly scalable games
  • Implemented leading technologies to enhance the user experience, increase the company’s value proposition to investors, and prepare for the company’s future mobile strategy
  • Interviewed and mentored subsequent developers for the team
  • Completed prototype two weeks ahead of schedule progressing beyond initial specifications for a more robust demo
  • Participated in Darden Business School Startup Incubator; worked directly with team of MBAs, experienced entrepreneurs and advisors to learn fundamental business concepts and startup lifecycle

Redschoolhouse.org

Web Designer / Developer / Sys Admin
Charlottesville, VA
Summer 2011 - Spring 2013

My stomping ground for web development. Heavy jQuery work to create custom widgets, site optimizations to speed up page loads, tooling work to speed up content entry

  • Improved page responsiveness of web-based content management system by replacing hard page refreshes with AJAX calls and other client side optimizations
  • Improved user experience by redesigning layouts with an emphasis on ease of use and simplifying navigation
  • Grew registered user pool by 16% up to 2,900 by developing dynamic, extensible widgets that non-technical content contributors utilize to engage users
  • Provided real-time support to five major Universities presently using the site offering technical support and providing real-time troubleshooting to non-technical client staff
